content: this blanket is a variation on the classic 6-day kid blanket 1 it utilizes the striping effect known as australian confetti created by glynis aka oldboiler robo glynis was inspired by the crochet pattern confetti waves designed kate rowell the blanket pictured used 5 skeins each of four colors of lion brand yarn 2 affiliate link woolease in grey heather blush heather rose heather and dark rose heather 1 https //www bettymcknit com/6daykidblanket 2 https //www tinyurl com/bettyslby
